review: ** ****** ****** ** *** **** ************ ** **** **** **** True to all the other comments his approach is amazing. He spends ample time in explaining the issues n treatment and also gives an insight and encourages the parents how to take care of the children in any case. Doesn't give unecessary medicines nor recommends unecessary tests. We have known him for almost 8 years. He has handled both our children from the time they were born. So, One can trust him with their child's health and be assured they are in the best hands. The world needs pediatricians like him.

review: We are new in Hyd and I was looking for doctor for my daughter. someone told me about Dr Akeel and This was my second visit to the doctor. He is very good, very friendly with kids and explained the issue very well. For my daughter now I am going to visit him only. Will not give you unnecessary medicine

review:
Doctor gives you ample time to explain the problem and the best part about this doctor is, 
he avoids you from visiting diagnostic centers 
he never gives you a list of medicines
And if you start consulting him for a year, you will be able to take care of your child atleast till you reach the doctor. 
He makes you much equipped with what needs to be done. Kudos to these kind of doctors which are really a rare in this age.
